title: Shoujo no Iroha
description:
1. Yuugen Onsen Kidan

2. Yuugen Futsuma Kidan

3. Yuugen Kamioroshi Kidan part 1

4. Yuugen Kamioroshi Kidan part 2

5. Iinchou no Aisatsu (Chairman's Introduction)
This is the sequel to the main story of Chairman's Lover. Now that they're lovers, Miyashiro has decided to introduce herself to Kobayakawa's parents. Unfortunately, no one is home, so it's just the two of them all alone.

6. Fuzoroi no Puzzle (Unfitting Puzzle)

7. Angetsu no Megami
